dialogue.text: What am I? I am the space where the question plays.

psychological_notes: Ultimate perspective shift—Evan recognizes himself as the awareness within which all experience occurs, including the question 'What am I?' This represents the deepest level of psychological integration, where identity expands to include the space of consciousness itself.
philosophical_underpinning: Consciousness as the unchanging witness of all change
therapeutic_direction: Beyond therapy—recognition of self as the space where all healing occurs
